name: Blue vs Red (BvR)
description:
Hello and thankyou for trying out my game, i have always loved playing RTS games, and watching the Ai duke it out on maps. So to help me learn Unreal Engine i decided to create this project, Blue Vs Red or BVR for short. Its a simple non interactive game that is based around two Factions locked in an everlasting war across planets.
A loose backstory is (you could call them aliens), but essentially the little Troops/Tanks you see in the game are made up of pure Energy or Life force, they come from a home solar system with a red sun and a blue sun and a single planet split down the middle between the two colours.
There are 16 Maps total to watch the Ai fight on, the Goal is to destroy the Enemy's HQ building, they work off random movement/waypoints to guide them towards each other, they all only have collision with no bullets (yet).
All music is also made by me along with all of the low res textures and models.
This is just a project i quite enjoy working on, and its in a good enough state now i think other people might hopefully enjoy it too.
Windows Only.
No settings menu. (yet)
Test PC Specs with decent Performance:
4th Gen i7/32gb DDR3/GTX 1050ti

Updated from .95 to .96 and fixed no audio on one of the maps.
